credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Semiramide
provenance: Acquired new and directly from designers, museums, and cultural institutions by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description: Black-and-white collage of geometric shapes, including stripes, animals (snakes, a donkey, and a peacock), Etruscan masks, Mesopotamian (?) architectural details, and other imagery suggesting the exotic Orient. Inscription, in magenta with traces of blue: "SEMIRAMIDE", followed by "OPERNAHAUS ZURICH", and in small black type along lower left: " Santi / De Bosio / Luzzati / Cau / Kamper / chor und orchester der Oper Zurich / ad 12. mai 1992 / Rossini Fest 1992 / Unterstutzt von der / Schweizerischen Bankolbellschaft".
name: Poster
